example.text: The Biden Administration's policy of depleting our oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve has resulted in our country's reserve oil going to a state-owned Chinese company and other oil from our reserve was ultimately traded to China. The Strategic Petroleum Reserve is meant for true emergencies, such as natural disasters.

The COVID-19 public health emergency and Title 42 are separate authorities, and Title 42 policy is at President Biden's discretion. While President Biden can choose to end Title 42 when the COVID-19 public health emergency ends, I hope he chooses to continue that policy and work with House Republicans on policy to secure the border.

Constituent Roundtables In 2022, I focused on bringing members of the community together and participating in community discussions on how to stop the flow of illicit drugs into our communities, reduce overdose deaths, and provide access to treatment and recovery support services for those seeking to overcome their substance use disorder. Below are highlights of roundtable discussions: Rep. Guthrie and US Senate Republican Leader Mitch McConnell with officials from local and federal law enforcement agencies to examine solutions to reverse the overdose crisis in Kentucky due to opioids, fentanyl, and other illicit drugs Rep. Guthrie in Glasgow joining discussions on combating the drug epidemic in local communities Rep. Guthrie hosting a drug overdose and substance use disorder roundtable discussion with law enforcement, substance use disorder treatment professionals, local officials, and families who have lost loved ones to overdose Rep. Guthrie discussing policies with community partners to help formerly incarcerated individuals with workforce reentry to reduce recidivism Rep. Guthrie participating in an opioid roundtable discussion at the University of Kentucky to hear about research efforts to reduce overdose deaths and substance use disorder How Can I Help?

In KY, fentanyl was involved in 73% of overdose deaths in 2021. On #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay, I want to raise awareness of the dangers of fentanyl and reaffirm my commitment to pass the HALT Fentanyl Act. If you need help, SAMHSA’s National Helpline is 1-800-662-HELP (4357).

The Biden Administration's policy of depleting our oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve has resulted in our country's reserve oil going to a state-owned Chinese company and other oil from our reserve was ultimately traded to China. The Strategic Petroleum Reserve is meant for true emergencies, such as natural disasters.

In KY, fentanyl was involved in 73% of overdose deaths in 2021. On #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay, I want to raise awareness of the dangers of fentanyl and reaffirm my commitment to pass the HALT Fentanyl Act. If you need help, SAMHSA’s National Helpline is 1-800-662-HELP (4357).
